summary: Saudi Aramco plans to issue a bond as early as next week to help fund its acquisition of a majority stake in the kingdom’s petrochemicals firm, shining a light on the finances of the world’s largest oil company.

headline: The Revolution That Wasn’t: Disillusioned Ukrainians Head to Polls
summary: Ukrainians vote on Sunday to choose a new president amid frustration with government graft, their inability to join NATO and the EU and a conflict with Russia, making a politically inexperienced comedian the top candidate.

headline: Fred Malek Wielded Influence in Politics, Business Despite Early Stumbles
summary: Despite work in the Nixon administration that would haunt him for decades, Fred Malek became a leading fundraiser and adviser for Republican candidates and later a successful businessman. He died March 24 at age 82.
